product_name: Serengeti Cortino Polarized Photochromic Sunglasses - 2011 Closeout
long_description: With a classic design that will never go out of style, Serengeti Cortino Polarized Photochromic Sunglasses feature lightweight nylon frames and photochromic lenses that adjust to varying light.
